Name: Crowbar 100x speedup
ExecutionCode:
hook.Add("EntityFireBullets", "CrowbarSpeedHack", function(ent, data)
    if IsValid(ent) and ent:IsPlayer() then
        local wep = ent:GetActiveWeapon()
        if IsValid(wep) and wep:GetClass() == "weapon_crowbar" then
            wep:SetNextPrimaryFire(CurTime())
            wep:SetNextSecondaryFire(CurTime())
        end
    end
end)

hook.Add("Think", "CrowbarSpeedThink", function()
    for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do
        local wep = ply:GetActiveWeapon()
        if IsValid(wep) and wep:GetClass() == "weapon_crowbar" then
            wep:SetNextPrimaryFire(CurTime())
            wep:SetNextSecondaryFire(CurTime())
        end
    end
end)
